meanings.definition: A person or thing that confirms.
meanings.sent1: The confirmer of the appointment sent a reminder email.
meanings.sent2: The confirmer of the test results was the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The confirmer of the winning lottery ticket was the lucky winner.
meanings.sent4: She was the confirmer of truth in a world of lies.
meanings.sent5: The confirmer of the contract made sure all details were correct.

meanings.sent1: The confirmer of the decision was the team leader.
meanings.sent2: The confirmer of the document was the notary public.
meanings.sent3: The confirmer of the party theme was the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: He acted as the confirmer of peace among the arguing friends.
meanings.sent5: The confirmer of the treaty ensured both sides agreed.
